name: First Steps
description: Complete your first objective.

name: Social Butterfly
description: Join a public lobby with at least 5 other people.

name: Lone Wolf
description: Create and complete an objective in a private room.

name: Completionist
description: Complete 10 objectives in a single game.

name: Speed Demon
description: Complete a single objective in under 10 seconds.

name: Strategist
description: Complete two adjacent objectives to start a line.

name: The Architect
description: Be the first to create a diagonal line on the board.

name: Full House
description: Complete a full row and column in the same game.

name: Master of Disguise
description: Change your username at least three times.

name: Bingo Master
description: Be the first player to achieve a Bingo in your lobby.

name: Globetrotter
description: Join a lobby with players from three different countries.

name: Late to the Party
description: Join a lobby after the game has already started.

name: Quick Thinker
description: Complete a Bingo in under one minute.

name: Double Vision
description: Achieve two Bingos in a single game.

name: The Champion
description: Win five games in a row as a participant.

name: The Host with the Most
description: Host a lobby with ten or more participants.

name: Weekend Warrior
description: Play a game between Friday and Sunday.

name: The Early Bird
description: Be the first participant to join a newly created lobby.

name: Socializer
description: Use the chat feature to send at least ten messages.

name: The Observer
description: Join a game as a participant but do not complete any objectives.

name: Hidden Gem
description: Find and complete a secret objective not on the board.

name: The Collector
description: Complete one of every type of objective on the board.

name: Night Owl
description: Play a game between 12 AM and 5 AM.

name: The Strategist
description: Achieve Bingo with the middle square as the final completed objective.

name: The Navigator
description: Complete a path of five objectives, moving horizontally and vertically.

name: The Survivor
description: Be the last player remaining in a game after everyone else has left.

name: The Ghost
description: Win a game without your name appearing in the top player list.

name: The Joker
description: Complete an objective using a wild card.

name: The Scribe
description: Fill out a bingo board and save it to your profile.

name: The Alchemist
description: Combine two different achievements to get a new one.
